---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or improvement
title: "feat: "
labels: enhancement
---

## Problem

What problem does this feature solve? Why is it needed?

## Proposed Solution

Describe the feature you'd like to see. Be specific about behavior.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered other approaches? Why is this one preferred?

## Additional Context

Any extra context, mockups, or references that help explain the request.
